about_the_game:
From the creator of Jalopy.

Define the story of Keiko, a young girl whose grandfather's sudden passing drops her into the cut-throat yet lucrative world of Vending Machine Tycoonism. Untold wealth awaits - if you can become the next Honcho!

Take on the Financial Clique

Take on the Keiretsu and reclaim your grandfather's rightful spot amongst Japan's financial elite. Deliver packages, purchase real estate and expand your company to show them you're more than just another Sukeban.

A Kei Truck of Legend!

Purchase your Kei truck through auction and discover it's quirks. Customize, maintain and upgrade your way to a vehicle of legend.

Navigate procedurally-generated 1980's Japan.

Complete deliveries, install vending machines, and explore a stylized Shōwa era Japan. From busy corporate streets to winding mountain paths.

Vending Machine Tycoonism

Discover a heartfelt story of betrayal, mystery and hope while navigating the cut-throat and lucrative world of Vending Machine Tycoonism.

name: Honcho

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 1GB memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Take on the Keiretsu and reclaim your grandfather's rightful spot amongst Japan's financial elite. Use your bespoke kei truck to deliver packages, purchase real estate and expand your company to show them you're more than just another Sukeban.
